1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council

The City of Plainview is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the city. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the governing body. All governing body members serve four year terms. The governing body, being the elected representatives of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions, and determines the general goals and policies.

  • City Hall 202 W. 5th St. Plainview, TX 79072
  • Thursday preceding second and fourth Tuesday of each month
  • City Hall 202 W. 5th St. Plainview, TX 79072
  • Charles Starnes , Mayor Term expires May 2028
  • Mary Elizabeth Dickerson , District 1 Representative Term expires May 2026
  • Steve Martinez , District 2 Representative Term expires May 2026
  • Gilbert Garcia , District 3 Representative Term expires May 2026
  • Gary House , District 4 Representative Term expires May 2026
  • Daniel Rascon , District 5 Representative Term expires May 2028
  • Evan Weiss , District 6 Representative Term expires May 2028
  • Lorie Rodriguez , District 7 Representative Term expires May 2028
